fields.text: A unique aura available only to Mages
Grants Faster Cast Rate, Mana Recovery Bonus, and Defense to allies
Creates a spiraling ring of flame that deals fire damage to unlucky enemies
Uses the same skill as druid; can also benefit from it's synergies
Their devotion to others has unlocked the final form of Enchant
Endows allies with the arcane knowledge of mana deliverance
Call forth the permafrost of the northen tundras to pierce your enemies cold resistance
Uses the same skill as sorc; can also benefit from it's synergies
Sends out a frozen orb that shoots ice projectiles in all directions
Uses the same skill as sorc; can also benefit from it's synergies
